title: Summoner Name Punishment
body: I wanted to know if i could be perma banned for having a little on edge name .  I don't want to say the name because i don't people to steal it . How would i get banned and how long would it last or is it for life . I really really like this summoner name but i am very afraid that it might get my $650 account banned so what are the punishments of having a little on edge summoner name .

replies.body: If you feel the name might be questionable then it might not be worth the risk.  We do review name reports, and will change names if necessary.  In extreme cases or consistency, we may permanently ban an account as well.  Feel free to get a pulse check from the community directly, and ask about this on the [PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) as well!
